thread.title: Sania Mirza Is Angry With The Media! Why? Because She Feels They Are Focusing On Her Tax Notice Instead Of Her Game - Indiatimes.com
thread.title_full: Sania Mirza Is Angry With The Media! Why? Because She Feels They Are Focusing On Her Tax Notice Instead Of Her Game - Indiatimes.com

title: Sania Mirza Is Angry With The Media! Why? Because She Feels They Are Focusing On Her Tax Notice Instead Of Her Game - Indiatimes.com
text:
Indiatimes February 18, 2017 
Sania Mirza came down heavily on sections of the media for choosing to focus on negative news rather than her entry into the semis in the ongoing Qatar Open. 
AFP 
Mirza and Barbora Strycova of the Czech Republic entered the women's doubles last-four stage and will take on American-Slovenian duo of Abigail Spears and Katarina Srebotnik later on Friday. 
"Standing ovation to our amazing certain sections of media who haven't bothered to write or report about me being in another semi finals of a tournament in Qatar, but heyyy there are 100 articles about 'tax evasion' which most of them don't even understand properly," Sania tweeted on Friday. 
AFP 
"As to what's going on I think is pretty clear negative news sells a lot more than positive news or achievements I guess!!" she added. 
The service taxes division of the customs department had issued notice asking Mirza to appear before authorities on February 16 - either in person or through representatives. 
AP 
Sania's accountant appeared on her behalf. 
In her report, Mirza said the Rs 1 crore given to her by the Telangana government was a "training incentive". 
With inputs from IANS. Don't Miss
